title: Google Doodle shows the brutal realities of climate change over time
content:
Out of respect for Earth Day, Google has replaced their homepage logo with a series of timelapse animations showing the harsh realities of climate change.

description: Out of respect for Earth Day, Google's homepage shows a series of timelapse animations showing the harsh realities of climate change.
